alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Delaware County through 715 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sidney Center, or 8 miles northwest of Walton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walton, Delhi, Colchester, Meredith, Hamden, Franklin, Sidney Center, East Sidney, Meridale and East Meredith. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 near 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
